clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability Study of Single Dose of Abatacept 125mg Administered Subcutaneously
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of Single Dose of Abatacept 125mg Administered Subcutaneously in Chinese Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to assess the single dose PK, safety, tolerability and immunogenicity of abatacept 125mg administered SC in Chinese healthy subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Signed Informed consent form (ICF) to Day 71

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti cytotoxic T lymphocyte-associated antigen-4(CTLA-4) antibodies

intervention.description: On Day 1, subjects will receive a single SC dose of abatacept 125mg
On Day 1, subjects will receive a single SC dose of placebo
